intro: Argyrolobium abyssinicum f. diffusum, commonly known as the Abyssinian silverlobed crotalaria, is a flowering plant native to Ethiopia. It belongs to the legume family, Fabaceae, and is characterized by its silver-gray foliage and showy yellow flowers. The plant has a sprawling growth habit and produces small, pod-like fruits that contain seeds. It is adapted to arid and semi-arid environments, making it a resilient species in harsh conditions.
